xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content: namestrategies.currentStrategy.label=Current naming strategy namestrategies.currentStrategy.hint=The name strategy will be used when creating, renaming, or saving documents. namestrategies.useTransformation.label=Transform names automatically namestrategies.useTransformation.hint=If enabled, the name strategy will be used to automatically adapt the name when possible. namestrategies.useValidation.label=Validate names before saving namestrategies.useValidation.hint=If enable, the name strategy will validate the name before saving: use this feature with caution since it might prevent saving some existing documents. namestrategies.ReplaceCharacterNameStrategy.name=Character replacement namestrategies.SlugNameStrategy.name=Preformatted names (no accents, no space, no special characters) namestrategies.replacementCharacter.configuration=Character Replacement Strategy Configuration namestrategies.testStrategy.label=Test the strategy you selected namestrategies.testStrategy.hint=Allows you to check the behaviour of the name strategy you chose namestrategies.testStrategy.placeholder=Type here the name of a page to test it namestrategies.testStrategy.validName=Is this name valid with the selected strategy? namestrategies.testStrategy.transformedName=Name after transformation by the selected strategy: namestrategies.replacementCharacter.livetable.forbiddenCharacter=Forbidden characters namestrategies.replacementCharacter.livetable.replacementCharacter=Replacement characters namestrategies.replacementCharacter.livetable._actions=Actions namestrategies.replacementCharacter.add=Add new character namestrategies.replacementCharacter.addNewCharacter=Add new character to forbid or replace namestrategies.replacementCharacter.newForbiddenCharacter.label=New forbidden character namestrategies.replacementCharacter.newForbiddenCharacter.hint=This character will be forbidden in page names namestrategies.replacementCharacter.newForbiddenCharacter.placeholder=Type here the new forbidden character namestrategies.replacementCharacter.newReplacementCharacter.label=New replacement character namestrategies.replacementCharacter.newReplacementCharacter.hint=This character will replace the forbidden character in page names. If not specified, the forbidden character will be removed from page names. namestrategies.replacementCharacter.newReplacementCharacter.placeholder=Type here the new replacement character or leave empty namestrategies.replacementCharacter.create.inProgress=New forbidden character is being added... namestrategies.replacementCharacter.create.done=New forbidden character has been successfully added. namestrategies.replacementCharacter.create.failed=Error when adding the new forbidden character. namestrategies.replacementCharacter.removeCharacter=Deletion of a forbidden character namestrategies.replacementCharacter.removeCharacter.warning=Are you sure to delete this forbidden character? namestrategies.replacementCharacter.removeCharacter.remove=Delete namestrategies.replacementCharacter.remove.inProgress=The forbidden character is being deleted... namestrategies.replacementCharacter.remove.done=The forbidden character has been deleted. namestrategies.replacementCharacter.remove.failed=Error when deleting a forbidden character. namestrategies.replacementCharacter.emptyReplacementCharacter=None
